name: SimplyHip-HopRadio
0:
”Alexa, play Simply Hip Hop Radio”
”Alexa, open Simply Hip Hop Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simply hip hop radio
des: SimplyRadio.com's Hip Hop Legacy since 1997. Find yourself surrounded by the essence of Hip Hop, with dynamic beats and electrifying rhythms, on our dedicated Hip Hop station at SimplyRadio.com. It's all personally handpicked 24/7 by DJ Kenny Scan. Since 1997, we have been curating the culture, lyrics, and spirit of Hip Hop for decades. We bring you a continuous flow of tracks that epitomize its growth from the streets to the world scene. Classic tracks that forged the blueprint. Pioneering sounds that break new ground. Aggregated and handpicked, our selection captures the heart and soul of the genre. Hailing from Brooklyn, NY—home of it all—this station embraces the spirit of the streets 24/7. Let the rhythm resonate. Uncover the soul of Hip Hop on SimplyRadio.com, where the underground comes to life with the underground sounds emanating from DJ Kenny Scan.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
